00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              CONVERSION BETWEEN 
00004  *              POLAR AND CARTESIAN COORDINATES
00005  *******************************************************
00006  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00007  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place
00008  *
00009  */
00010 
00011 // Check against redundant including
00012 #ifndef TT_POLAR_H
00013 #define TT_POLAR_H
00014 
00015 // Include appropriate headers
00016 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00017 #include <math.h>
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_polar:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00029                 typedef void (tt_polar::*function_ptr_2in_2out)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);                    
00030                 function_ptr_2in_2out dsp_executor;
00031 
00032                 // Attributes Values & Variables
00033                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     mode;
00034                 
00035         
00036         public:
00037                 enum selectors{                                                                 // Attribute Selectors
00038                         k_mode,                         
00039                         k_mode_cartopol,
00040                         k_mode_poltocar,
00041                 };
00042                 
00043 
00044                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00045                 tt_polar()                                                                              // Constructor          
00046                 {
00047                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_cartopol);
00048                 }
00049                 
00050                 tt_polar(selectors init_mode)
00051                 {
00052                         set_attr(k_mode, init_mode);
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 ~tt_polar()                                                                     // Destructor
00056                 {
00057                         ;
00058                 }
00059 
00060 
00061                 // ATTRIBUTES
00062                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00063                 {
00064                         switch (sel){
00065                                 case k_mode:
00066                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00067                                         if(mode == k_mode_cartopol)
00068                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_polar::dsp_vector_calc_cartopol;
00069                                         else if(mode == k_mode_poltocar)
00070                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_polar::dsp_vector_calc_poltocar;
00071                                         break;
00072                         }
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00076                 {
00077                         switch (sel){
00078                                 case k_mode:
00079                                         return mode;
00080                                 default:
00081                                         return 0.0;
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084                 
00085                 
00086                 /*****************************************************
00087                  * DSP LOOPS
00088                  *****************************************************/
00089                 
00090                 // Publically exposed interface for the dsp routine
00091                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00092                 {
00093                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in1, in2, out1, out2);    // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00094                 }
00095         
00096         private:
00097                 // DSP LOOP: CARTOPOL
00098                 void dsp_vector_calc_cartopol(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00099                 {
00100                         tt_sample_value real, imaginary, magnitude, phase;
00101                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00102                                                                         
00103                     while (temp_vs--){
00104                                 real = *in1->vector++;
00105                                 imaginary = *in2->vector++;
00106 
00107                                 magnitude = sqrt((real * real) + (imaginary * imaginary));
00108                                 
00109                                 if (real == 0)
00110                                         real = 0.000001;                                // prevent divide by zero
00111                                 phase = atan(imaginary / real); 
00112                                 if ((real < 0) && (imaginary < 0))              // arctangent corrections
00113                                         phase = phase - 3.14159265;
00114                                 else if ((real < 0) && (imaginary >= 0))
00115                                         phase = phase + 3.14159265;
00116 
00117                                 *out1->vector++ = magnitude;
00118                                 *out2->vector++ = phase;        
00119                     }
00120                     in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 // DSP LOOP: POLTOCAR
00124                 void dsp_vector_calc_poltocar(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00125                 {
00126                         tt_sample_value real, imaginary, magnitude, phase;
00127                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00128                                                                         
00129                     while (temp_vs--){
00130                                 magnitude = *in1->vector++;
00131                                 phase = *in2->vector++;
00132 
00133                                 real = magnitude * cos(phase);
00134                                 imaginary = magnitude * sin(phase);
00135 
00136                                 *out1->vector++ = real;
00137                                 *out2->vector++ = imaginary;    
00138                     }
00139                     in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00140                 }               
00141 };
00142 
00143 #endif          // TT_POLAR_H
